settings.title_text_a:
Being alone is not
the same as being lonely
settings.description_text_a: We all feel lonely sometimes and rush into interaction with people just to interact with other human beings and heal ourselves. Is that necessary?
settings.title_text_b: Learn the importance of your alone time, and how to pick the right company at the right time.
